com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.commands

Class IOCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.commands.IOCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker

    @Component
public class IOCommands
extends Object
implements org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker
    Spring Shell Command class for PGN (Import and Export) Created by Toby Leheup on 06/01/16 for pgn-extract-alt.
    Author:
    Toby Leheup (Bigtobster) Controls Input and Output of PGN files

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static String FAILED_EXPORT
      The substring in console on any import failure

      The substring in console on any import failure

      The string for the FilePath option of Import
      (package private) static String GAMES_EXPORTED
      The substring for successful export and count of number of imported games

      The substring for successful import and count of number of imported games
      (package private) static String INVALID_SYNTAX
      Message on PGN parse syntax failure
      (package private) static String NO_FILE_AT
      The substring in console on file not found error
      (package private) static String NOT_A_PGN_FILE
      The substring in console on input not being PGN
      (package private) static String PGN_NOT_READABLE
      The substring for importing a PGN with no read permission
      (package private) static String PGN_NOT_WRITABLE
      The substring for export a PGN with no read or write permission
      (package private) static String SUCCESSFUL_EXPORT
      The substring in console on any successful export
      (package private) static String SUCCESSFUL_IMPORT
      The substring in console on any successful import
      (package private) static String SUCCESSFUL_RESET
      The string in console on successful reset of PGN-Extract-Alt

      • exportPGN

        @CliCommand(value="export",
            help="Export loaded data as a PGN file. Available on successful import.")
public String exportPGN(@CliOption(key="FilePath",mandatory=true,help="Path (including file name) for exported PGN. File will be created if it doesn\'t exist.")
                                                                                                                                          String filePath)
        Attempt to export a PGN file
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the PGN file to be imported
        Returns:
        Successful export of PGN file

public static boolean isImportAvailable()

        Returns:

      • importPGN

        @CliCommand(value="import",
            help="Import a PGN file for processing")
public String importPGN(@CliOption(key="FilePath",mandatory=true,help="Path to the PGN file to be imported")
                                                                                                         String filePath)
                                                                                                  throws IOException
        Attempt to import a PGN file
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the PGN file to be imported
        Returns:
        Successful import of PGN file
        Throws:
        IOException - Crashes on unknown failure to open PGN file

      • isExportAvailable

        @CliAvailabilityIndicator(value="export")
public boolean isExportAvailable()
        Describes when "export" command is available
        Returns:
        boolean Available on confirmed PGN import

        @CliAvailabilityIndicator(value="reset")
public boolean isResetAvailable()

            help="Reset PGN-Extract-Alt - WARNING: Will lose all changes. Available on successful import.")

        Returns:
